name: Linear Run
description:
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Linear Runner is a Casual Game.

If Game works Slow in HTML5, try downloading it.

How to Download?

  • Download the Linearrun.zip file
  • Extract the file to the desired location.
  • Run the LinearRun.exe file.
  • Enjoy

Controls?

  • "A" to move Left
  • "D" to move Right
  • "Q"/"E" to go back to Main Menu.

Aim?

There are 7 stages, Each one is Harder than the previous one.

Can you reach the 7th Stage?

By Developer

This game was highly inspired by"EdgeRunner". Check this game out too...

LinearRun was made in Unity, Sounds by Freesound.org.
